sentences.en: Dad had managed to &B{whip himself up into} a fantastic rage.
sentences.cn: 爸爸设法激起自己的愤慨。

sentences.en: Few people doubt his ability to whip the economy into shape.
sentences.cn: 几乎无人怀疑他整顿经济的能力。

sentences.en: He continually cracked his whip and shouted at the mule.
sentences.cn: 他不住地挥响着鞭子,吆喝牲口.

sentences.en: He could whip a crowd into hysteria.
sentences.cn: 他能让一群人变得歇斯底里。

sentences.en: He cracked his whip and the horse leapt forward.
sentences.cn: 他甩了个响鞭，马儿就奋蹄向前奔去。

sentences.en: He lashed the horse across the back with his whip.
sentences.cn: 他用鞭子抽打马背.

sentences.en: He urged the horse on with a whip.
sentences.cn: 他挥鞭策马前行.

sentences.en: He whipped the horse into a canter.
sentences.cn: 他抽了一下鞭子，马儿就小跑起来。

sentences.en: It's cruel to use a whip to punish a child.
sentences.cn: 用鞭子惩罚孩子是残酷的.

sentences.en: tea with whips of sugar.
sentences.cn: 加了许多糖的茶。

sentences.en: The carter flipped at the horse with his whip.
sentences.cn: 赶大车的人扬鞭朝着马轻轻地抽打.

sentences.en: The coachman cracked his whip and the carriage lurched forward.
sentences.cn: 马车夫甩了一记响鞭，马车猛然向前冲去。

sentences.en: The cruel man lashed the horse with his whip.
sentences.cn: 那个粗暴的人用鞭子抽马.

sentences.en: The dog cowered under the table when his master raised the whip.
sentences.cn: 主人举起鞭子时,狗抖缩在桌子下边.

sentences.en: The dog cringed at the sight of the whip.
sentences.cn: 狗见了鞭子畏缩不前.

sentences.en: The jockey said he tended to flick horses with the whip.
sentences.cn: 骑手说他经常会用鞭子抽马。

sentences.en: the sea was whipped up by a force-nine gale.
sentences.cn: 九级大风掀起海上巨浪。

sentences.en: The whip cracked threateningly.
sentences.cn: 鞭子挥得噼啪响得惊人.

sentences.en: Whip the cream until thick.
sentences.cn: 搅打奶油直到它变黏稠。

sentences.en: Whip the eggs, oils and honey together.
sentences.cn: 把鸡蛋、油和蜂蜜搅打在一起。

sentences.en: whip up a light lunch.
sentences.cn: 迅速做好一顿轻便午餐

sentences.en: whipped up the mob; whip up enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 煽动暴民；激起热情

words.tran_cn: 鞭打者；抽打者；似用鞭子抽打者
鞭打；笞刑；用来缚扎的绳索
[畜牧]鞭子；抽打；车夫；[机]搅拌器

phrases.tran_cn: 以严厉手段命令(别人)，以严明纪律要求(别人)；对别人严厉地运用自己的影响(或权力)[亦称作 snap the whip]
支配地位，控制地位；优势
快马加鞭地，火急地，以最快速度
召集：使聚集在一起，如政党成员或一群猎狗
使进入某特定状态：强劲且常用暴力地使进入某特定状态或条件
很快地搞出；迅速准备好（尤指食物）
【非正式用语】 迅速准备好

trans.tran_cn: 鞭子，纪律委员，投票指示
trans.tran_en: a long thin piece of rope or leather with a handle, that you hit animals with to make them move or that you hit someone with to punish them
to hit someone or something with a whip

trans.tran_cn: 鞭笞；猛地移动；搅打成糊状
trans.tran_en: to hit someone or something with a whip
